name: Llamatron: 2112
summary: The player controls a llama which can move on a single-screen playfield. The llama constantly fires a stream of white energy bolts in the direction it is moving. The player can 'hold' the fire direction, so that the llama can move freely whilst firing in a direction; alternatively the player can control the game with two joysticks, choosing the move and fire directions independently.

name: Lloyd the Monkey
summary: In the game, you play as Lloyd, a monkey trained in sword-fighting, as he travels the world in search of the gorillas who kidnapped his friends. As you get closer to the enemy base, a thrilling secret becomes unraveled before your eyes and you won't want to miss one heart pounding moment.

name: LlamaTangle
summary: Untangle all of the points so that no lines cross

name: Llama Adventure
summary: A text adventure flash game by jmtb02. You're a llama.

name: Llamasoft: The Jeff Minter Story
summary: 42 of the weirdest, trippiest, sheepiest games ever created. Enter the mind of Jeff Minter, the legendary creator of Attack of the Mutant Camels, Gridrunner, and Tempest 2000, in this interactive documentary from Digital Eclipse.

name: LlamaRPG: Farm to Fable
summary: A turn-based combat RPG following a llama traveling around the world trying to be a hero. Full of great itemization, crafting, story, hat collecting, and more.

name: Lloyd the Monkey: Remastered
summary: Lloyd the Monkey: Remastered is a remastered version of the original game with various improvements, released originally for PC in the 2023 edition of Sonic Amateur Games Expo.

name: Llorona
summary: Solve the mystery of a Haunted Mansion known as 'La Quinta' and the Ghost of a Weeping woman that wanders the property.

name: Llloot!
summary:
A thievery roguelike created by James McNeill and Damien Moore.

Infiltrate ten randomly generated edifices of increasing size and difficulty; steal all of the valuables from under the noses of the patrolling guards; and escape into the night. Will you be speedy, leading guards on a chase through the halls before leaping out a window? Or slow and methodical, knocking them out and hiding their unconscious bodies in bushes or under beds so they won't be spotted? Keep an eye out for treasure and memorable achievements.

name: Llamalandia
summary: In Llamalandia you play as a cute Llama that got lost in the mountains, prepare yourself to explore a new world that you have never seen before, while you embark on a magical journey across the Bolivian altiplano, facing many challenges in order to find your family and save the rest of your species.

name: Lloyd the Monkey 3 Expansion: The Warrior Once Called Prince
summary: Told over the course of five stages, the campaign details Grecian prince Octavius's efforts in protecting his younger sister and his kingdom from Scholz's initial efforts for conquest, culminating in the explosive battle teased in Lloyd the Monkey 2's cold open.

name: LLM x Quiz
summary: A quiz battle adventure where AI asks and judges! Use skill cards to change the tide and defeat the stone guardian with your knowledge. Each match takes around 15 minutesâ€”fun, casual, and great for all ages!

name: Lloyd the Monkey 3: Judgement Day
summary: Two years have passed since Lloyd and Lura defeated Kronos and his Dark Gorillas, seemingly once and for all, and the duo have gone their seperate ways. However, the villain Scholz is ripping his way through countless lives in order to complete a decade-spanning plan to conquer the universe once and for all. The final battle is about to begin, and the blood shed at the end of it all will sow the seeds of a new beginning.

name: Lloyd the Monkey 2
summary: A sci-fi platformer in which a simian swordsman teams up with an alien princess to save the world.

name: Llamagotchi
summary:
Are you ready for llama fun?
Your llama needs to get to the top of a mountain! Will you help? Spend days playing games, feeding, and taking care of your llama. Build a barn and gain trust with your llama friend before traveling up the mountain together.
Llamagotchi is a solo developed indie game, every download helps me to continue development to make Llamagotchi even better. Please spread the word to family and friends!

name: Llamas With Hats: Cruise Catastrophe
summary: Punt cruise passengers off the boat as Carl the llama.

name: Llama God
summary: Climb the corporate ladder by sacrificing your coworkers to the Llama god

name: LlamaCarrot
summary: Find the dragon and feed it a carrot!

name: LLK
summary: This is a memory game that can exercise your memory. You must remember the look and color of the diamond immediately after you see it, and choose the same to eliminate it. As the level becomes more difficult, more diamonds will appear for you to choose Come and fight together.

name: Lloyd, Sasha and Seven Love Affair Partners
summary: A role-playing game from Suzuya.

name: Llama the Farm Drama
summary: Play as a Llama! Spit on farm animals, farmers and end-cows. Speedrun cozy farms and unique dungeons in this short, fun and light-hearted platformer.

name: Llama Villa
summary: "The Sims but with llamas". Shower, feed, and shear your llamas! Play with your llamas, buy them nice furniture, and acquire even more llamas. Build a llama villa!
